bibl.title: A Geographic, Archaeological, and Scientific Commentary on Strabo's Egypt ("Geographika", Book 17, Sections 1-2). With an Appendix on the Libyan Chapters.
bibl.note: Diss. New York Univ. Summary in DA 59 (1998-1999) p. 1559-A. - Compares Strabo's testimony with other Greek and with Latin sources (literary, epigraphic, and papyrologic); important archaeologic sources are also noted.
KNIGHT Mary, A Geographic, Archaeological, and Scientific Commentary on Strabo's Egypt ("Geographika", Book 17, Sections 1-2). With an Appendix on the Libyan Chapters.
